comment: Loved Professor Edwards! She explains everything so well. She gives study guides for each test and gives you 5 bonus points on the test if you complete them. You also get to use an index card for each test and exempt the final if you have an A in the class and 3 or less absences. She is great!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--CARES ABOUT STUDENTS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Prof. Edwards has been my FAVORITE professor at KSU so far. Her powerpoint are very to the point with plenty of examples. If you're confused she will help you&explain in a more clear way. Everything is online, but go to class and it's an EASY A. Study guides for the test are worth 5 extra bonus points. You get an index "cheat" card every test. EASY

Mrs. Edwards is fantastic! She explains concepts really well (note: I am terrible at math) and she gives study guides for each test. If you complete the study guide and turn it in the day of the test you get 5 extra points on the test! Also, if you have an A and less than 3 absences at the end of the semester you can exempt the final. Go to class.

Mrs. Edwards is honestly one of my favorite professors here at KSU. I thought I would struggle with statistics, but I actually did very well. If you complete the study guide she gives you and turn it into her on test day, she gives you extra credit. She was very easy to understand, and she was extremely helpful. I would DEFINITELY recommend taking

Easy Class. AMAZING TEACHER!! If you have an A in the class, you get to exempt the final which is awesome. She is super helpful and she provides study guides and also allows students to use note cards on exams! Best teacher I have ever had in college. Highly recommend! Easy A
